attributes.action: request that all government/nhs/public buildings are powered by solar panels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Considering the size and magnitude of many hospitals and public buildings, the scope for solar power to run their heating/hot water is huge. Therefore if this government is truly committed to energy saving and fighting global warming they should lead by example and save taxpayers money at the same time by introducing solar powered public buildings and pass on the savings to taxpayers through better provision of services.
